Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.CaptchaShowOnNewsCommentPage.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to show CAPTCHA on news page when writing a comment.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اگر می‌خواهید هنگام نوشتن نظرات در صفحه‌ی اخبار، CAPTCHA به کاربر نمایش داده شود، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.CaptchaShowOnProductReviewPage.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to show CAPTCHA on product reviews page when writing a review.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اگر می‌خواهید هنگام نوشتن نظرات، CAPTCHA به کاربر نمایش داده شود، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.CaptchaShowOnRegistrationPage.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to show CAPTCHA on registration page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: جهت نمایش CAPTCHA در صفحه‌ی ثبت‌نام، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.ConvertNonWesternChars.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to take out the accent marks in the letters of SEO names while keeping the letter.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to take out the accent marks in the letters of SEO names while keeping the letter.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.DefaultMetaDescription.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default meta description for pages in your store. You can override this for individual categories / products / manufacturer pages.
Translation.TranslatedValue: The default meta description for pages in your store. You can override this for individual categories / products / manufacturer pages.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.DefaultMetaKeywords.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default meta keywords for pages in your store. You can override these for individual categories / products / manufacturer pages.
Translation.TranslatedValue: The default meta keywords for pages in your store. You can override these for individual categories / products / manufacturer pages.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.DefaultStoreThemeForDesktops.GetMore
Translation.SourceValue: You can get more themes on

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.DefaultStoreThemeForDesktops.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The public store theme for desktops. You can download themes from the extensions page at www.nopcommerce.com.
Translation.TranslatedValue: تم فروشگاه برای کامپوترهای رومیزی (Desktop). جهت دانلود تم‌های دیگر، می‌توانید به صفحه‌ی افزونه‌ها در www.nopcommerce.com مراجعه کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.DefaultStoreThemeForMobileDevices.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The public store theme for mobile devices. You can download themes from the extensions page at www.nopcommerce.com.
Translation.TranslatedValue: تم فروشگاه برای دستگاه‌های موبایل. جهت دانلود تم‌های دیگر، می‌توانید به صفحه‌ی افزونه‌ها در www.nopcommerce.com مراجعه کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.DefaultTitle.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default title for pages in your store.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.DisplayEuCookieLawWarning.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Make the site EU cookie law compliant. When enabled, new customers will see an appropriate warning box.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Make the site EU cookie law compliant. When enabled, new customers will see an appropriate warning box.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.EnableCssBundling.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Enable to combine (bundle) multiple CSS files into a single file. Don't enable if you're running nopCommerce in web farms or Windows Azure. It also doesn't work in virtual IIS directories.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Enable to combine (bundle) multiple CSS files into a single file. Don't enable if you're running nopCommerce in web farms or Windows Azure. It also doesn't work in virtual IIS directories.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.EnableJsBundling.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Enable to combine (bundle) multiple JavaScript files into a single file. Don't enable if you're running nopCommerce in web farms or Windows Azure.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Enable to combine (bundle) multiple JavaScript files into a single file. Don't enable if you're running nopCommerce in web farms or Windows Azure.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.EncryptionKey.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The encryption private key used for storing sensitive data.
Translation.TranslatedValue: کلید خصوصی رمزنگاری جهت نگهداری داده‌های حساس

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.EncryptionKey.TheSame
Translation.SourceValue: The new encryption key is the same as the old one
Translation.TranslatedValue: کلید رمزنگاری جدید و کلید رمزنگاری فعلی، یکسان هستند.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.EncryptionKey.TooShort
Translation.SourceValue: Encryption private key must be 16 characters long
Translation.TranslatedValue: کلید خصوصیِ رمزنگاری باید 16 کاراکتری باشد.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FacebookLink.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Specify your Facebook page URL. Leave empty if you have no such page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: نشانی صفحه‌ی فیس‌بوک خود را وارد کنید. اگر چنین صفحه‌ای ندارید، این بخش را خالی بگذارید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.ForceSslForAllPages
Translation.SourceValue: Force SSL for all site pages
Translation.TranslatedValue: اجبار به استفاده از SSL در تمامی صفحات سایت

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.ForceSslForAllPages.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: By default not all site pages are SSL protected. Check to force SSL for the entire site. This setting is useful only when you have SSL enabled on your store details pages.
Translation.TranslatedValue: به‌صورت پیش‌فرض، تمامی صفحات وب‌سایت، محافظت‌شده با پروتکل SSL نیستند. جهت الزامی کردنِ SSL برای کل سایت، این گزینه را فعال کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.Disabled
Translation.SourceValue: Full-Text support has been disabled successfully.
Translation.TranslatedValue: قابلیت Full-Text با موفقیت عیرفعال شد.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.Enabled
Translation.SourceValue: Full-Text support has been enabled successfully.
Translation.TranslatedValue: قابلیت Full-Text با موفقیت فعال گردید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.NoiseWords
Translation.SourceValue: To prevent a full-text index from becoming bloated, Microsoft SQL Server has a mechanism that discards commonly occurring words that do not help the search. These words are called noise words, or stop words. Noise words are listed in the locale specific noise word files. For example, in the English locale, words such as "a," "and," "is," and "the" are in the English noise word file and are left out of the full-text index since they are empirically known to be useless to a search. Please contact your SQL Server administrator to get more information about it.
Translation.TranslatedValue: To prevent a full-text index from becoming bloated, Microsoft SQL Server has a mechanism that discards commonly occurring words that do not help the search. These words are called noise words, or stop words. Noise words are listed in the locale specific noise word files. For example, in the English locale, words such as "a," "and," "is," and "the" are in the English noise word file and are left out of the full-text index since they are empirically known to be useless to a search. Please contact your SQL Server administrator to get more information about it.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.NotSupported
Translation.SourceValue: Full-Text is not supported by your database
Translation.TranslatedValue: قابلیت Full-Text توسط پایگاه‌داده شما پشتیبانی نمی‌شود

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.SearchMode.Hint
Translation.TranslatedValue: حالت جستجوی Full-Text را انتخاب کنید

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.Supported
Translation.SourceValue: Full-Text is supported by your database
Translation.TranslatedValue: قابلیت Full-Text توسط پایگاه‌داده شما پشتیبانی می‌شود

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.GooglePlusLink.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Specify your Google+ page URL. Leave empty if you have no such page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: نشانی صفحه‌ی گوگل‌پلاس خود را وارد کنید. اگر چنین صفحه‌ای ندارید، این بخش را خالی بگذارید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.InvoiceFooterTextColumn1.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Enter the text that will appear at the bottom of generated invoices (left column).
Translation.TranslatedValue: Enter the text that will appear at the bottom of generated invoices (left column).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.InvoiceFooterTextColumn2.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Enter the text that will appear at the bottom of generated invoices (right column).
Translation.TranslatedValue: Enter the text that will appear at the bottom of generated invoices (right column).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.LoadAllLocaleRecordsOnStartup
Translation.SourceValue: Load all locale resources on startup
Translation.TranslatedValue: بارگذاری منابع محلی (Locale resources) هنگام اجرای فروشگاه

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.LoadAllLocaleRecordsOnStartup.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: When enabled, all locale resources will be loaded on application startup. The application start will be slower, but then all pages could be opened much faster.
Translation.TranslatedValue: در صورتی‌که این گزینه فعال باشد، تمامی منابع محلی (Locale resources) هنگام اجرای فروشگاه بارگذاری خواهند شد.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.LoadAllLocalizedPropertiesOnStartup
Translation.SourceValue: Load all localized properties on startup
Translation.TranslatedValue: بارگزاری تمامی ویژگی‌های بومی‌سازی‌شده هنگام اجرای فروشگاه

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.LoadAllLocalizedPropertiesOnStartup.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: When enabled, all localized properties (such as localized product properties) will be loaded on application startup. The application start will be slower, but then all pages could be opened much faster. It's used only when you have two or more languages enabled. Not recommended to enable when you have a large catalog (several thousand localized entities).
Translation.TranslatedValue: When enabled, all localized properties (such as localized product properties) will be loaded on application startup. The application start will be slower, but then all pages could be opened much faster. It's used only when you have two or more languages enabled. Not recommended to enable when you have a large catalog (several thousand localized entities).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.LoadAllUrlRecordsOnStartup
Translation.SourceValue: Load all search engine friendly names on startup
Translation.TranslatedValue: بارگزاری تمامی "نام‌های مناسب موتورهای جستجو" هنگام اجرای فروشگاه

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.LoadAllUrlRecordsOnStartup.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: When enabled, all slugs (search engine friendly names) will be loaded on application startup. The application start will be slower, but then all pages could be opened much faster. Not recommended to enable when you have a large catalog (several thousand entities).
Translation.TranslatedValue: When enabled, all slugs (search engine friendly names) will be loaded on application startup. The application start will be slower, but then all pages could be opened much faster. Not recommended to enable when you have a large catalog (several thousand entities).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.MobileDevicesSupported
Translation.TranslatedValue: وب‌سایت از دستگاه‌های موبایل پشتیبانی کند

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.MobileDevicesSupported.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to enable mobile devices support.
Translation.TranslatedValue: جهت پشتیبانی از دستگاه‌های موبایل، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.PageTitleSeoAdjustment.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Select a page title SEO adjustment. For example, generated page title could be (PAGE NAME | YOURSTORE.COM) instead of (YOURSTORE.COM | PAGE NAME).
Translation.TranslatedValue: تنظیمِات سئوی «عنوان صفحه» را انتخاب کنید. به عنوان مثال، عنوانِ‌تولیدشده می‌تواند به‌جای (نام صفحه | نام فروشگاه شما) به‌صورت (نام فروشگاه شما | نام صفحه) باشد.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.PdfLetterPageSizeEnabled
Translation.TranslatedValue: استفاده از کاغذ با اندازه‌ی نامه

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.PdfLetterPageSizeEnabled.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: If checked, uses Letter page size for PDF documents. Uses A4 page size if unchecked.
Translation.TranslatedValue: If checked, uses Letter page size for PDF documents. Uses A4 page size if unchecked.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.PdfLogo.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Image file that will be displayed in PDF order invoices. A small image is recommended.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Image file that will be displayed in PDF order invoices. A small image is recommended.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.reCaptchaPrivateKey.Hint
Translation.TranslatedValue: کلید خصوصی reCAPTCHA را وارد کنید (اگر فعال است)

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.reCaptchaPublicKey.Hint
Translation.TranslatedValue: کلید عمومی reCAPTCHA را وارد کنید (اگر فعال است)

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.ResponsiveDesignSupported.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to enable responsive design. Also note that your graphical theme should also support it.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to enable responsive design. Also note that your graphical theme should also support it.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.SeoFriendlyUrlsForLanguagesEnabled
Translation.SourceValue: SEO friendly URLs with multiple languages enabled
Translation.TranslatedValue: SEO friendly URLs with multiple languages enabled

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.SeoFriendlyUrlsForLanguagesEnabled.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: When enabled, your URLs will be http://www.yourStore.com/en/ or http://www.yourStore.com/ru/ (SEO friendly)
Translation.TranslatedValue: When enabled, your URLs will be http://www.yourStore.com/en/ or http://www.yourStore.com/ru/ (SEO friendly)

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.StoreClosed.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to close the store. Uncheck to re-open.
Translation.TranslatedValue: برای تعطیل کردن فروشگاه، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید (علامت بزنید). جهت بازگشایی مجدد فروشگاه، باید علامتِ‌این گزینه را بردارید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.StoreClosedAllowForAdmins
Translation.SourceValue: Allow an admin to view the closed store
Translation.TranslatedValue: مدیران سیستم بتوانند فروشگاه تعطیل‌شده را مشاهده کنند

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.StoreClosedAllowForAdmins.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to allow a user with admin access to view the store while it is set to closed.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to allow a user with admin access to view the store while it is set to closed.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.TwitterLink.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Specify your Twitter page URL. Leave empty if you have no such page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: نشانی کانال YouTube خود را وارد کنید. اگر چنین صفحه‌ای ندارید، این بخش را خالی رها کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.UseImagesForLanguageSelection
Translation.TranslatedValue: استفاده از عکس (پرچم) برای انتخاب زبان

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.UseImagesForLanguageSelection.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check if you want to use images for language selection.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اگر می‌خواهید هنگام انتخاب زبان به جای نام زبان از عکس (پرچم) استفاده شود، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.WwwRequirement.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Choose your store WWW prefix requirement. For example, http://yourStore.com/ could be automatically redirected to http://www.yourStore.com/.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Choose your store WWW prefix requirement. For example, http://yourStore.com/ could be automatically redirected to http://www.yourStore.com/.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.YoutubeLink.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Specify your YouTube channel URL. Leave empty if you have no such page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: نشانی کانال YouTube خود را وارد کنید. اگر چنین صفحه‌ای ندارید، این بخش را خالی رها کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.AssociatedProductPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for associated product images (part of 'grouped' products).
Translation.TranslatedValue: اندازه‌ی پیش‌فرضِ تصاویر محصولِ مرتبط (برحسب پیکسل).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.AvatarPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for avatar images.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اندازه‌ی پیش‌فرض (بر حسب پیکسل) برای تصاویر آواتار.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.CartThumbPictureSize
Translation.TranslatedValue: اندازه‌ی عکس بندانگشتیِ سبد خرید/فهرست علاقه‌مندی‌ها

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.CartThumbPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images on the shopping cart and wishlist.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اندازه‌ی پیش‌فرض (بر حسب پیکسل) برای عکس بندانگشتی محصولات در سبد خرید و فهرست علاقه‌مندی‌ها

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.CategoryThumbPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images on category pages.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اندازه‌ی پیش‌فرض (بر حسب پیکسل) برای عکس بندانگشتی محصولات در صفحات دسته‌بندی‌ها

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.ManufacturerThumbPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images on manufacturer pages.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اندازه‌ی پیش‌فرض (بر حسب پیکسل) برای عکس بندانگشتی محصولات در صفحه‌ی تولیدکننده

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.MaximumImageSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The maximum image size (longest side) allowed for image uploads.
Translation.TranslatedValue: The maximum image size (longest side) allowed for image uploads.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.MiniCartThumbPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images in the mini-shopping cart block.
Translation.TranslatedValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images in the mini-shopping cart block.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.PicturesStoredIntoDatabase.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: A value indicating whether pictures are stored in database or file system.
Translation.TranslatedValue: مقداری که مشخص می‌کند که آیا تصاویر در پایگاه‌داده ذخیره گردد یا در فایل‌سیستم؟

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.PicturesStoredIntoDatabase.Note
Translation.SourceValue: NOTE: Do not forget to backup your database before changing this option
Translation.TranslatedValue: توجه: اکیدا توصیه می‌شود قبل از تغییر این گزینه، از پایگاه‌داده‌ نسخه پشتیبان تهیه کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.ProductDetailsPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for product detail images.
Translation.TranslatedValue: The default size (pixels) for product detail images.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.ProductThumbPictureSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images displayed on category or manufacturer pages.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اندازه‌ی پیش‌فرض (بر حسب پیکسل) برای عکس بندانگشتی محصولات در صفحات دسته‌بندی‌ها یا صفحات تولیدکنندگان

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Media.ProductThumbPictureSizeOnProductDetailsPage.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images displayed on product details page when you have more than one product image.
Translation.TranslatedValue: The default size (pixels) for product thumbnail images displayed on product details page when you have more than one product image.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.AllowNotRegisteredUsersToLeaveComments
Translation.SourceValue: Allow not registered users to leave comments
Translation.TranslatedValue: کاربرانِ ثبت‌نام‌نشده، مجاز به ثبت دیدگاه باشند

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.AllowNotRegisteredUsersToLeaveComments.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to allow not registered users to leave comments.
Translation.TranslatedValue: اگر می‌خواهید کاربران ثبت‌نام‌نشده هم بتوانند دیدگاه خود را ثبت کنند، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.Enabled.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to enable the news in your store.
Translation.TranslatedValue: جهت فعال‌سازی اخبار در فروشگاه، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.MainPageNewsCount.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The number of news items to display on your home page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: تعداد آیتم‌های خبری که مایلید بر روی صفحه‌ی اصلی شما نمایش داده شود.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.NewsArchivePageSize.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: A number of news displayed on one page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: تعداد اخبار نمایش داده شده در هر صفحه

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.NotifyAboutNewNewsComments
Translation.TranslatedValue: اطلاع‌رسانی هنگام ثبت یک دیدگاه جدید برای اخبار

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.NotifyAboutNewNewsComments.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to notify store owner about new news comments.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to notify store owner about new news comments.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.ShowHeaderRSSUrl
Translation.SourceValue: Display news RSS feed link in the browser address bar
Translation.TranslatedValue: نمایش لینکِ فیدِ RSS اخبار در نوار آدرس مرورگر

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.ShowHeaderRSSUrl.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to enable the news RSS feed link in customers browser address bar
Translation.TranslatedValue: جهت نمایش لینکِ فیدهای RSS مربوط به اخبار در نوار آدرس مرورگر مشتری، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.News.ShowNewsOnMainPage.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to display your news items on your store home page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: آیا آیتم‌های خبری در صفحه‌ی اصلی فروشگاه شما نمایش داده شود؟

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.AnonymousCheckoutAllowed.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to enable anonymous checkout (customers are not required to login/register when purchasing products)
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to enable anonymous checkout (customers are not required to login/register when purchasing products)

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.AttachPdfInvoiceToOrderCompletedEmail.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to attach PDF invoice to the "order completed" email sent to a customer.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to attach PDF invoice to the "order completed" email sent to a customer.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.AttachPdfInvoiceToOrderPlacedEmail.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to attach PDF invoice to the "order placed" email sent to a customer.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to attach PDF invoice to the "order placed" email sent to a customer.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.DisableBillingAddressCheckoutStep.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to disable "Billing address" step during checkout. Billing address will be pre-filled and saved using the default registration data (this option cannot be used with guest checkout enabled). Also ensure that appropriate address fields that cannot be pre-filled are not required (or disabled).
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to disable "Billing address" step during checkout. Billing address will be pre-filled and saved using the default registration data (this option cannot be used with guest checkout enabled). Also ensure that appropriate address fields that cannot be pre-filled are not required (or disabled).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.DisableOrderCompletedPage.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: When disabled, customers will be automatically redirected to the order details page.
Translation.TranslatedValue: When disabled, customers will be automatically redirected to the order details page.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.GiftCards_Activated.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Gift cards are activated when the order status is...
Translation.TranslatedValue: کارت‌های هدیه زمانی فعال خواهند شد که وضعیت سفارش برابر باشد با...

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.GiftCards_Activated.Pending
Translation.SourceValue: Order status could not be set to Pending
Translation.TranslatedValue: وضعیت سفارش نمی‌تواند با مقدار "معلق" تنظیم شود

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.GiftCards_Deactivated.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Gift cards are deactivated when the order status is...
Translation.TranslatedValue: کارت‌های هدیه زمانی غیرفعال خواهند شد که وضعیت سفارش برابر باشد با...

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.GiftCards_Deactivated.Pending

Translation.TranslatedValue: وضعیت سفارش نمی‌تواند با مقدار "معلق" تنظیم شود

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.IsReOrderAllowed.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check if you want to allow customers to make re-orders.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check if you want to allow customers to make re-orders.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.NumberOfDaysReturnRequestAvailable
Translation.SourceValue: Number of days that the return request is available
Translation.TranslatedValue: Number of days that the return request is available

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.NumberOfDaysReturnRequestAvailable.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Set a certain number of days that the Return Request Link will be available in the customer area. For example, if the store owner allows returns within 30 days of purchase, they would set this to 30. Logged in customers, viewing orders in My Account, would then not see Return Request buttons for orders completed more than thirty days ago.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Set a certain number of days that the Return Request Link will be available in the customer area. For example, if the store owner allows returns within 30 days of purchase, they would set this to 30. Logged in customers, viewing orders in My Account, would then not see Return Request buttons for orders completed more than thirty days ago.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.OnePageCheckoutDisplayOrderTotalsOnPaymentInfoTab
Translation.SourceValue: Order totals on payment info tab
Translation.TranslatedValue: Order totals on payment info tab

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.OnePageCheckoutDisplayOrderTotalsOnPaymentInfoTab.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to display a product list and order totals on the payment info tab (one-page checkout).
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to display a product list and order totals on the payment info tab (one-page checkout).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.OnePageCheckoutEnabled.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: One page checkout is a single web page your customers can use to buy a products/service from you.
Translation.TranslatedValue: پرداخت یک‌صفحه‌ای، یک صفحه‌ی وب منفرد است که مشتریان شما می‌توانند جهت خرید سریع‌تر یک محصول یا سرویس از شما از آن استفاده کنند.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.OrderIdent.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Set the order ID counter. This is useful if you want your orders to start at a certain number. This only affects orders created going forward. The value must be greater than the current maximum order ID.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Set the order ID counter. This is useful if you want your orders to start at a certain number. This only affects orders created going forward. The value must be greater than the current maximum order ID.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.ReturnRequestActions.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: A comma-separated list of actions a customer will be able to choose when submitting a return request.
Translation.TranslatedValue: A comma-separated list of actions a customer will be able to choose when submitting a return request.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.ReturnRequestReasons.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: A comma-separated list of reasons a customer will be able to choose when submitting a return request.
Translation.TranslatedValue: A comma-separated list of reasons a customer will be able to choose when submitting a return request.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.ReturnRequestsDescription1
Translation.SourceValue: The returns system will allow your customers to request a return on items they've purchased. These are also known as RMA requests.
Translation.TranslatedValue: The returns system will allow your customers to request a return on items they've purchased. These are also known as RMA requests.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.ReturnRequestsDescription2
Translation.SourceValue: NOTE: This option is available for completed orders.
Translation.TranslatedValue: NOTE: This option is available for completed orders.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Order.ReturnRequestsEnabled.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check if you want to allow customers to submit return requests for items they've previously purchased.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check if you want to allow customers to submit return requests for items they've previously purchased.

Translation.TranslatedValue: Require customers to accept or decline terms of service before processing the order (on the confirm order page)

Translation.TranslatedValue: Require customers to accept or decline terms of service before processing the order (on the shopping cart page)

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.RewardPoints.Description
Translation.SourceValue: The Reward Points Program allows customers to earn points for certain actions they take on the site. Points are awarded based on making purchases and customer actions such as registration.
Translation.TranslatedValue: سیستم جایزه‌دهی، مشتریان را قادر می‌سازد تا به ازاء انجام فعالیت‌های معینی در سایت، امتیازاتی کسب نمایند. امتیاز بر اساس خرید و فعالیت‌های مشتری مانند ثبت‌نام تعلق می‌گیرد.

Translation.TranslatedValue: اگر مایلید که «سیستم جایزه‌دهی» فعال شود، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.RewardPoints.MinimumRewardPointsToUse.Hint

Translation.TranslatedValue: Customers won't be able to use reward points before they have X amount of points. Set to 0 if you do not want to use this setting.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.RewardPoints.PointsForPurchases_Amount.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Specify number of points awarded for purchases.

Translation.SourceValue: Points are awarded when the order status is...

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.RewardPoints.PointsForPurchases_Canceled.Hint

Translation.TranslatedValue: Bypass shipping method page if there's only one

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Shipping.BypassShippingMethodSelectionIfOnlyOne.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to bypass a shipping method page during checkout if there's only one shipping method available.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to bypass a shipping method page during checkout if there's only one shipping method available.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Shipping.DisplayShipmentEventsToCustomers.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check if you want your customers to see shipment events on their shipment details pages (if supported by your shipping rate computation method).
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check if you want your customers to see shipment events on their shipment details pages (if supported by your shipping rate computation method).

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Shipping.EstimateShippingEnabled.Hint

Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to allow customers to estimate shipping on shopping cart page

Translation.SourceValue: Check to enable free shipping for all orders over 'X'. Set the value for X below.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to enable free shipping for all orders over 'X'. Set the value for X below.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Shipping.FreeShippingOverXIncludingTax.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to calculate 'X' value including tax; otherwise excluding tax.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to calculate 'X' value including tax; otherwise excluding tax.

Translation.SourceValue: All orders with a total greater than the value of 'X' will qualify for free shipping.
Translation.TranslatedValue: تمامی سفارش‌هایی که جمع کل آنها از مقدار 'X' بیشتر باشد، واجد شرایط «حمل رایگان» خواهند بود.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Shipping.UseWarehouseLocation.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Check to use warehouse location when requesting shipping rates. This is useful when you ship from multiple warehouses.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to use warehouse location when requesting shipping rates. This is useful when you ship from multiple warehouses.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.ShoppingCart.AllowAnonymousUsersToEmailWishlist
Translation.SourceValue: Allow guests to email their wishlists

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.ShoppingCart.AllowAnonymousUsersToEmailWishlist.Hint

Translation.TranslatedValue: اگر می‌خواهید کاربران مهمان مجاز به ارسال فهرست علاقه‌مندی شان از طریق ایمیل باشند، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to allow customers to edit items already placed in the cart. It could be useful when your products have attributes or any other fields entered by a customer.

Translation.SourceValue: If checked, a customer will be taken to the Shopping Cart page immediately after adding a product to their cart. If unchecked, a customer will stay on the same page that they are adding the product to the cart from.
Translation.TranslatedValue: If checked, a customer will be taken to the Shopping Cart page immediately after adding a product to their cart. If unchecked, a customer will stay on the same page that they are adding the product to the cart from.

Translation.TranslatedValue: If checked, a customer will be taken to the Wishlist page immediately after adding a product to their wishlist. If unchecked, a customer will stay on the same page that they are adding the product to the wishlist from.

Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to move products from wishlist to the cart when clicking "Add to cart" button. Otherwise, they are copied.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Tax.AllowCustomersToSelectTaxDisplayType

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Tax.AllowCustomersToSelectTaxDisplayType.Hint

Translation.TranslatedValue: مقداری که مشخص می‌کند که آیا مشتریان مجاز به انتخاب نوع نمایش مالیات باشند؟

Translation.SourceValue: A value indicating whether each tax rate should be displayed on a separate line (shopping cart page).
Translation.TranslatedValue: مقداری که مشخص می‌کند که آیا هر نرخ مالیات در یک سطر جداگانه باید نمایش داده شود؟ (صفحه‌ی سبد خرید)

Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to skip VAT validation. Entered VAT numbers will always be valid. It will be a client responsibility to provide the correct VAT number.

Translation.TranslatedValue: Check if you want to receive a notification (email) when a new VAT number is submitted.

Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to enable EU VAT (the European Union Value Added Tax)

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Tax.EuVatShopCountry.Hint

Translation.TranslatedValue: Check if you want to use the EU web service to validate VAT numbers. WARNING: If this option is enabled, then DO NOT disable country form field available during registration (public store).

Translation.TranslatedValue: Force tax exclusion from order subtotal

Translation.SourceValue: Check to always exclude tax from order subtotal (no matter of selected tax dispay type). This setting effects only pages where order totals are displayed.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Check to always exclude tax from order subtotal (no matter of selected tax dispay type). This setting effects only pages where order totals are displayed.

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Tax.HideTaxInOrderSummary

Translation.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.Tax.HideTaxInOrderSummary.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: A value indicating whether to hide tax in order summary when prices are shown tax inclusive.

Translation.TranslatedValue: اگر می‌خواهید این موضوع، رمز داشته باشد، این گزینه را انتخاب کنید.

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.LimitedToStores.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Determines whether the topic is available only at certain stores.
Translation.TranslatedValue: مشخص می‌کند که آیا موضوع، فقط در فروشگاه‌های معینی در دسترس است؟

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.MetaDescription.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Meta description to be added to topic page header.
Translation.TranslatedValue: متا تگ توضیحات، که به سرصفحه‌ی موضوع افزوده می‌شود.

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.MetaKeywords.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Meta keywords to be added to topic page header.
Translation.TranslatedValue: متا تگ کلمات کلیدی، که به سرصفحه‌ی موضوع افزوده خواهد شد.

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.MetaTitle.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Override the page title. The default is the name of the topic.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Override the page title. The default is the name of the topic.

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.Password.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: The password to access the content of this topic
Translation.TranslatedValue: رمز عبور جهت دسترسی به این موضوع

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.SeName.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Set a search engine friendly page name e.g. 'some-topic-name' to make your page URL 'http://www.yourStore.com/some-topic-name'. Leave empty to generate it automatically based on the title of the topic.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Set a search engine friendly page name e.g. 'some-topic-name' to make your page URL 'http://www.yourStore.com/some-topic-name'. Leave empty to generate it automatically based on the title of the topic.

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Fields.Store.Hint

Translation.TranslatedValue: فروشگاهی را که این موضوع به آن مرتبط است انتخاب کنید

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.List.SearchStore.Hint
Translation.TranslatedValue: جستجو بر اساس یک فروشگاه مشخص.

Translation.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Topics.Updated
Translation.SourceValue: The topic has been updated successfully.

Translation.Name: Admin.Customers.CustomerRoles.Fields.Name.Hint

Translation.Name: Admin.Customers.CustomerRoles.Fields.PurchasedWithProduct.Hint

Translation.Name: Admin.Customers.Customers.Fields.Vendor.Hint
Translation.SourceValue: Choose a vendor associated to this customer account. When associated this customer will be able to login to the chosen vendor portal and manage his products and orders.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Choose a vendor associated to this customer account. When associated this customer will be able to login to the chosen vendor portal and manage his products and orders.

Translation.Name: Admin.Customers.Customers.Impersonate.Description1
Translation.SourceValue: During the order placement process, you will see almost exactly what the customer would see while browsing this site, with the exception of the header menu (you will see the following text 'Impersonated as customer@email.here - finish session'). Navigate to the products the customer wants and add them to the cart exactly as the customer would, then use the 'Checkout' button to proceed through the usual checkout process.
Translation.TranslatedValue: During the order placement process, you will see almost exactly what the customer would see while browsing this site, with the exception of the header menu (you will see the following text 'Impersonated as customer@email.here - finish session'). Navigate to the products the customer wants and add them to the cart exactly as the customer would, then use the 'Checkout' button to proceed through the usual checkout process.

Translation.Name: Admin.Customers.Customers.Impersonate.Description2
Translation.SourceValue: Note: Click 'finish session' link in order to finish this session
Translation.TranslatedValue: Note: Click 'finish session' link in order to finish this session

Translation.Name: Admin.Orders.Fields.OrderStatus.Change.ForAdvancedUsers
Translation.SourceValue: This option is only for advanced users (not recommended to change manually). All appropriate actions (such as inventory adjustment, sending notification emails, reward points, gift card activation/deactivation, etc) should be done manually in this case.
Translation.TranslatedValue: این گزینه فقط مخصوص کاربران حرفه‌ای است. (تغییر دستی توصیه نمی‌شود). در این حالت، تمام اقدامات (مانند تنظیم موجودی، ارسال ایمیل‌های اطلاع‌رسانی، امتیاز جایزه، فعال/غیر فعال کردن کارت هدیه، و غیره) باید به صورت دستی انجام شود.

Translation.TranslatedValue: تخفیفِ جمعِ جزءِ این سفارش (بدون مالیات)

Translation.Name: EUCookieLaw.CannotBrowse
Translation.SourceValue: You cannot browse this site until you accept cookies
Translation.TranslatedValue: تا زمانی‌که کوکی‌های مرورگرتان را فعال نکنید امکان مشاهده این وبسایت را ندارید.

Translation.Name: EUCookieLaw.Description
Translation.SourceValue: On 26 May 2011, the rules about cookies on websites changed. This site uses cookies. One or more of the cookies we use is essential for parts of this website to operate and has already been set. You may delete and block all cookies from this site, but parts of the site will not work. To find out more about cookies used on this website and how to delete cookies, see our privacy policy
Translation.TranslatedValue: قوانین مربوط به کوکی‌ها در وب‌سایت، در تاریخ 5 خرداد 1390 تغییر یافته است. این سایت از کوکی‌ها استفاده می‌کند. تعدادی از این کوکی‌ها جهت انجام عملیات این سایت ضروری بوده و در حال حاضر تنظیم شده‌اند. شما می‌توانید تمامی کوکی‌ها را حذف کنید و یا آنها را عیرفعال نمایید اما ممکن است بعضی از امکانات سایت به‌درستی کار نکنند. جهت کسب اطلاعات بیشتر در مورد کوکی‌های مورد استفاده‌ی ما و نیز نحوه حذف کوکی‌ها به بخش "سیاسیت‌های حریم خصوصی" در همین سایت مراجعه فرمایید.

Translation.Name: EUCookieLaw.Description2
Translation.SourceValue: Cookies help us deliver our services. By using our services, you agree to our use of cookies.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Cookies help us deliver our services. By using our services, you agree to our use of cookies.

Translation.SourceValue: The comma-separated list of product identifiers (e.g. 77, 123, 156). You can find a product ID on its details page. You can also specify the comma-separated list of product identifiers with quantities ({Product ID}:{Quantity}. for example, 77:1, 123:2, 156:3). And you can also specify the comma-separated list of product identifiers with quantity range ({Product ID}:{Min quantity}-{Max quantity}. for example, 77:1-3, 123:2-5, 156:3-8).

Translation.Name: Plugins.Shipping.ByWeight.Formula.Value
Translation.SourceValue: [additional fixed cost] + ([order total weight] - [lower weight limit]) * [rate per weight unit] + [order subtotal] * [charge percentage]

Translation.TranslatedValue: فقط کاربرانِ ثبت‌شده می‌توانند نظر خود را ثبت نمایند.

Translation.Name: Reviews.Overview.First
Translation.SourceValue: Be the first to review this product
Translation.TranslatedValue: اولین کسی باشید که در مورد این محصول نظر می‌دهید

Translation.Name: Reviews.SeeAfterApproving
Translation.SourceValue: You will see the product review after approving by a store administrator.
Translation.TranslatedValue: شما پس از تایید نظر توسط مدیر فروشگاه قادر به مشاهده‌ی آن خواهید بود.

Translation.Name: Reviews.SuccessfullyAdded
Translation.TranslatedValue: نظر (درباره‌ی محصول) با موفقیت ثبت گردید.

Translation.Name: RewardPoints.CurrentBalance
Translation.SourceValue: Your current balance is {0} reward points ({1}).
Translation.TranslatedValue: موجودی فعلی شما {0} امتیازِ جایزه ({1}) است.

Translation.Name: RewardPoints.MinimumBalance
Translation.SourceValue: Minimum balance allowed to use is {0} reward points ({1}).
Translation.TranslatedValue: حداقل موجودی مجاز به استفاده برابر است با: {0} و امتیاز جایزه، ({1}) می‌باشد.

Translation.Name: RewardPoints.NoHistory
Translation.SourceValue: There is no balance history yet
Translation.TranslatedValue: There is no balance history yet

Translation.Name: Search.EnterSearchTerms
Translation.TranslatedValue: لطفا کلماتی را برای جستجو وارد کنید.

Translation.Name: Search.NoResultsText
Translation.SourceValue: No products were found that matched your criteria.
Translation.TranslatedValue: هیچ محصولی منطبق بر ضوابط جستجوی شما وجود ندارد.

Translation.Name: Search.SearchTermMinimumLengthIsNCharacters
Translation.SourceValue: Search term minimum length is {0} characters
Translation.TranslatedValue: Search term minimum length is {0} characters

Translation.Name: ShoppingCart.BuyingDisabled
Translation.SourceValue: Buying is disabled for this product
Translation.TranslatedValue: خرید این محصول، در حال حاضر ممکن نیست.

Translation.Name: ShoppingCart.CannotMixStandardAndAutoshipProducts
Translation.SourceValue: Your cart has standard and auto-ship (recurring) items. Only one product type is allowed per order.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Your cart has standard and auto-ship (recurring) items. Only one product type is allowed per order.

Translation.Name: ShoppingCart.ConflictingShipmentSchedules
Translation.SourceValue: Your cart has auto-ship (recurring) items with conflicting shipment schedules. Only one auto-ship schedule is allowed per order.
Translation.TranslatedValue: Your cart has auto-ship (recurring) items with conflicting shipment schedules. Only one auto-ship schedule is allowed per order.

Translation.Name: ShoppingCart.CrossSells
Translation.SourceValue: Based on your selection, you may be interested in the following items
Translation.TranslatedValue: Based on your selection, you may be interested in the following items

Translation.Name: ShoppingCart.CustomerEnteredPrice.RangeError

Translation.TranslatedValue: کوپن خود را اینجا وارد کنید

Translation.Name: ShoppingCart.DiscountCouponCode.WrongDiscount

Translation.TranslatedValue: The coupon code you entered couldn't be applied to your order

Translation.TranslatedValue: Enter your destination to get a shipping estimate

Translation.TranslatedValue: This product requires the following product is added to the cart: {0}

Translation.TranslatedValue: این فروشگاه در حال حاضر تعطیل است

Translation.Name: Wishlist.EmailAFriend.OnlyRegisteredUsers
Translation.SourceValue: Only registered customers can use email a friend feature
